author: Nicholas C
title: Great Beijing hotel in great location
text: Stayed at The Hilton Wangfujing again for 3 nights on business. If you are staying in central. I've stayed several times previously as the hotel has exceptional staff and is centrally located in regards to sightseeing and restaurants. Also, the rooms are large, spotless in cleanliness and well maintained. I would high recommend the hotel if you are visiting Beijing. Thank you Martina for your 100% commitment to guest requirements during my stay.
